news.title: Kneecap Cancel U.S. Tour
news.summary: The Irish rap group cited the tour’s proximity to Mo Chara’s court appearance on a terror charge, but shows in Canada will go ahead

news.summary: The rapper is reviving the Antagonist Tour several years after its initial announcement

news.title: Earl Sweatshirt, KeiyaA, Jackie West, and More: This Week’s Pitchfork Selects Playlist
news.summary: Our weekly playlist highlights songs that our writers, editors, and contributors are listening to on repeat
